data.comment: The match is underway in Monterrey.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Monterrey throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Attention is being given to Monterreyâ€™s Aviles Hurtado and play has been suspended briefly.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Orbelin Pineda of Cruz Azul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cruz Azul are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 19, Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Cruz Azul are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Monterrey.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 23, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Aviles Hurtado has recovered and rejoins the match in Monterrey.
In the minute 24, Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Cruz Azul.
Monterrey pushes forward through Sebastian Vegas, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Cruz Azul's area.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 33, Free kick Cruz Azul.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Cruz Azul drives forward and Yoshimar Yotun gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 37, Cruz Azul's Milton Caraglio misses with an attempt on goal.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 40, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pablo Aguilar (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Monterrey are pushing forward but Arturo Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 48, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 52, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Cruz Azul.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 58, Monterrey take a 1-0 lead thanks to Rogelio Funes Mori.
Arturo Gonzalez with an assist there.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 61, Free kick Cruz Azul.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's first substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Jesus Gallardo replacing Aviles Hurtado.
In the minute 62, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
The home team replace Celso Ortiz with Matias Kranevitter.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 66, Roberto Alvarado is replacing Yoshimar Yotun for Cruz Azul at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Arturo Gonzalez with Vincent Janssen. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Monterrey.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Nicolas Sanchez for Monterrey has been booked by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre and receives a first yellow card.
Juan Escobar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Monterrey.
Vincent Janssen (Monterrey) has received a yellow card from Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 77, Monterrey drive forward but Vincent Janssen is judged offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Santiago Gimenez is on a sub for Milton Caraglio for Cruz Azul.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre blows against Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori for offside.
In the minute 83, Monterrey are coming forward and Carlos Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Misael Dominguez is replacing Orbelin Pineda for the away team.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Monterrey make their fourth substitution with Angel Zapata replacing Rogelio Funes Mori.
The home team replace Maximiliano Meza with Miguel Layun.
In the minute 88, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Monterrey drive upfield and Angel Zapata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cruz Azul defender.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
Free kick Monterrey.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Matias Kranevitter (Monterrey) gets a yellow card.
